CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

PROJECT(Assimp)

SET(ASSIMP_VERSION_MAJOR 4)
SET(ASSIMP_VERSION_MINOR 0)
SET(ASSIMP_VERSION_PATCH 1)
SET(ASSIMP_VERSION ${ASSIMP_VERSION_MAJOR}.${ASSIMP_VERSION_MINOR}.${ASSIMP_VERSION_PATCH})

SET(ASSIMP_PROJECT_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${ASSIMP_PROJECT_DIR}/../..")

SET(RTTI_FORCE_ON TRUE)

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Compiler.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Build/CMake/ExternalCommon.cmake)

SET_PROPERTY(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

SET(ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR "${ASSIMP_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(KLAYGE_BIN_DIR "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/KlayGE/bin/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/assimp-${ASSIMP_VERSION}.patched.7z")
SET(SEVENZIP_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_HOST_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z")
SET(PACKAGE_COMMIT_ID "1fb91791d83470b1a67a5ee96cd7d8b3f9822185")
SET(PACKAGE_FILE_ID "6652389dc59cac3c1669d73c21fd415e9f093e50")

DOWNLOAD_PACKAGE("assimp" ${REL_PATH} ${PACKAGE_COMMIT_ID} ${PACKAGE_FILE_ID} "Readme.md")

IF(KLAYGE_COMPILER_MSVC)
	SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} /W3 /WX-")
	SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} /W3 /WX-")
ELSE()
	SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -Wno-error")
	SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error")
ENDIF()

OPTION(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS "" OFF)
OPTION(BUILD_TESTING "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_OPT_BUILD_PACKAGES "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_ANDROID_JNIIOSYSTEM "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_NO_EXPORT "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_TOOLS "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_MMD_IMPORTER "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_NONFREE_C4D_IMPORTER "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_SAMPLES "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_BUILD_ZLIB "" OFF)
OPTION(ASSIMP_INSTALL_PDB "" OFF)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${ASSIMP_PROJECT_DIR} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/assimp")

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(assimp PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	DEBUG_POSTFIX "_d"
	OUTPUT_NAME assimp${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(IrrXML PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	DEBUG_POSTFIX "_d"
	OUTPUT_NAME IrrXML${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(zlibstatic PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${ASSIMP_OUTPUT_DIR}
	PROJECT_LABEL zlibstatic
	DEBUG_POSTFIX "_d"
	OUTPUT_NAME zlibstatic${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
)
